definition: Hinzu is typically used to indicate the addition or inclusion of something, often in the context of joining or adding something to an existing group, collection, or set. It is commonly employed to express the act of including or adding an element, item, or person to an already established entity.

examples.german: Bitte fügen Sie Ihre Unterschrift hinzu.
Er hat noch ein paar Worte hinzu gefügt.
examples.english: He added a few more words.

examples.german: Hinzu kommt, dass ich keine Zeit habe.
examples.english: In addition, I don't have time.

examples.german: Sie können noch weitere Informationen hinzu fügen.
